full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): #, ,DPAL YE SHES KYI MKHA' 'GRO MA SENG GE'I GDONG PA CAN GTZO 'KHOR GSUM GYI BDAG MDUN BSKANG BSHAGS BSTOD BSKUL BA SGRAL LAS GTOR BZLOG DANG BCAS PA'I RNAM BZHAG MKHA' 'GRO'I DGONGS RGYAN ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @031A *, ,(CES DPAL YE SHES KYI MKHA' 'GRO MA SENG GE'I GDONG BA CAN GTZO 'KHOR GSUM GYI BDAG MDUN BSKANG BSHAGS BSTOD BSKUL BSGRAL LAS GTOR BZLOG DANG BCAS PA'I RNAM BZHAG MKHA' 'GRO'I DGONGS RGYAN ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, SNGA SOR GZHUNG LUGS DU MA LA SPOBS PA MCHOG TU DGE BA RAB 'BYAMS SMRA BA NGAG DBANG SHES RAB KYIS BSKUL TE HAR CHIN THU MED KYIS CHAR GSAR RTZOM BGYIS PA ZHIG YOD KYANG DER @031B BSGRAL LAS KYI RIM PA MA TSANG BAR BRTEN PHYIS SU MDZO DGE STOD NAS DON GNYER BA 'GA' ZHIG GIS CHA TSAR DGOS ZHES BSKUL NGOR, SNGA MA LA BSGYUR 'GOD PHRAN BU DANG, KHA SKYOR DBYE BA'I SKOR YANG KHA BSKANG STE, BTZUN PA DKON MCHOG 'JIGS MED DBANG POS GA-YAR KHRAL DU SBYAR BA DGE BAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
